sentences.en: 'shall we hire a sedan - chair to take her home? "
sentences.cn: “ 叫一顶轿子送她去 么 ? ”

sentences.en: " Have you left anything in the sedan - chair? "
sentences.cn: “ 还有什么在轿里 么 ? ”

sentences.en: After a short pause, he added, " They've promised to take you there in a sedan - chair.
sentences.cn: 停了一息说:“他答应轿子来接. ”

sentences.en: As she reached a road intersection, a Ford sedan stopped.
sentences.cn: 她走到交叉路口时, 一辆福特牌轿车停了下来.

sentences.en: Before five in the morning, the sedan bearers washed and cooked rice.
sentences.cn: 早晨不到五点钟, 轿夫们淘米煮饭.

sentences.en: By the way , the sedan bearers say we can get to the school by this afternoon. "
sentences.cn: 轿夫说今天下午可以到学校了. ”

sentences.en: If I don't leave this house in a bridal sedan - chair , I won't go!
sentences.cn: 告诉你, 我出回门子,还是非坐花轿不出这个门!

sentences.en: In the Kao family, servants and sedan - chair carriers alone came to several dozen.
sentences.cn: 在这个大的绅士家庭里单是仆人、轿夫之类的“下人”就有几十个.

sentences.en: Madam Wang and her five children quickly departed in three sedan - chairs.
sentences.cn: 于是四乘轿子带走了王氏和她的五个孩子(倩儿和带淑芳的杨奶妈也跟去了).

sentences.en: My parents own a Ford sedan.
sentences.cn: 我父母有一辆“福特”牌轿车.

sentences.en: On the sixth day of the New Year , Tigress climbed into the bridal sedan - chair.
sentences.cn: 初六, 虎妞坐上了花轿.

sentences.en: Sedan - chairs brought him and his father to the door of the West Szechuan Mercantile Corporation.
sentences.cn: 两乘轿子把他们父子送到西蜀实业公司经营的商业场的后门.

sentences.en: The chauffeur turned the sedan about.
The sedan - chair moved very quickly.
The touring sedan bucketed over the rocky road toward the ancient castle.
sentences.cn: 旅游车颠簸着开过石子很多的道路向那古城堡驶去.

trans.tran_cn: 色当（法国东北部一城市，1870年普法战争战场，法军大败于此）
